name: Butter Chicken
desc: Pulled tandoori chicken cooked in a silk smooth sauce of tomatoes, spices, garnished with cream and butter.

name: Lamb Chef Special
desc: Diced Chicken Breast/Lamb marinated in a traditional signature. Nepalese spices & curry leaf. Cooked in a home-style onion gravy.

name: Chicken Chef Special
desc: Diced Chicken Breast/Lamb marinated in a traditional signature. Nepalese spices & curry leaf. Cooked in a home-style onion gravy.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
desc: Tender chicken cooked with fenugreek leaves & fresh spices.

name: Chicken Karahi
desc: Tender chicken cooked with capsicum and onions prepared in a Karahi (wok).

name: Methi Chicken
desc: Tender chicken cooked with fenugreek leaves & fresh spices.

name: Korma Chicken or Lamb
desc: Mildly spiced dish with a thick sauce made up of Chicken/Lamb pieces braised in cream, coconut milk and spices.

name: Kenyan Curry Chicken or Lamb
desc: Diced on the bone chicken / lamb cooked in a special Kenyan sauce.

name: Lamb Rojan Josh
desc: Diced lamb cooked in tomato, onion gravy and spices.

name: Lamb Keema Curry
desc: Minced lamb cooked in onion, tomato sauce with spices.

name: Lamb Bhuna
desc: Tender lamb cooked in thick spiced gravy.

name: Methi Gosht
desc: Tender lamb with fenugreek leaves and spices.
